==Awards and honors==
==Awards and honors==
â
[[Image:Gloria_stuart_2010.jpgâ|left|thumb|Gloria Stuart at age 100 in July 2010]]
 
On June 19, 2010 Stuart was honored by the [[Screen Actors Guild]] for her years of service. She was presented the Ralph Morgan Award by ''Titanic'' co-star [[Frances Fisher]] and in response Gloria replied, "I'm very, very grateful. I've had a wonderful life of giving and sharing".<ref>[http://www.contactmusic.com/news.nsf/story/stuart-honoured-by-screen-actors-guild_1148669 Titanic - Stuart Honoured By Screen Actors Guild]</ref>
On June 19, 2010 Stuart was honored by the [[Screen Actors Guild]] for her years of service. She was presented the Ralph Morgan Award by ''Titanic'' co-star [[Frances Fisher]] and in response Gloria replied, "I'm very, very grateful. I've had a wonderful life of giving and sharing".<ref>[http://www.contactmusic.com/news.nsf/story/stuart-honoured-by-screen-actors-guild_1148669 Titanic - Stuart Honoured By Screen Actors Guild]</ref>
